'Quantity must be more than Delivered Quantity. Delivered Quantity is '&Trim(Str({0,157},'13'))
NOT ISNULL({2,396}) AND Trim({2,396}) <> '' AND (ISNULL({0,184}) OR Trim({0,184}) = '')

IF( Len(Trim({0,18})) + Len(ASCIIChr(13) & ASCIIChr(10) & Trim({0,17})) > 1000, Trim({0,18}), Trim({0,18}) & IF(Trim({0,18}) = '', '', ASCIIChr(13) & ASCIIChr(10)) & Trim({0,17}) )

SQL_STMT_U.val: select CAST(sum(Total) AS NUMERIC(18,4)) as RemainingBudget from ( SELECT ISNULL(SUM(BudgetTotal - RealTotal) , 0) AS Total FROM activitybudget_view where CoId = ':1' AND BplId = ':2' AND Fiscal = :3 AND Activity = ':4' AND Project = ':6' AND AcctCode = ':7' :5 union all SELECT ISNULL(sum((d.openqty * d.price)), 0) AS Total FROM prq1 d WHERE d.docentry = :8 and d.project = ':4' and d.acctcode = ':7' :5 ) T

ExpSyntax.val: IF({32768,120}, ' AND OcrCode = ' & ASCIIChr(39) & Trim(IF(ISNULL({0,6}), '', {0,6})) & ASCIIChr(39), '')

StrBuild( 'Year @1@, Co: @2@, Br: @3@, Acti: @4@, ocr: @5@, proj: @6@, act: @7@', IF(ISNULL({67,4}), 'NULL', Trim(Str({67,4}, '4'))), IF(ISNULL({67,11}), 'NULL', Trim({67,11})), IF(ISNULL({67,3}), 'NULL', Trim(Str({67,3}, '10'))), IF(ISNULL({0,4}), 'NULL', Trim({0,4})), IF(ISNULL({0,6}), 'NULL', Trim({0,6})), IF(ISNULL({67,10}), 'NULL', Trim({67,10})), IF(ISNULL({0,7}), 'NULL', Trim({0,7})) )
Trim({0,8}) & ' - Total Account per OCR: ' & Str({0,9}, VarPic({0,9}, 0))

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT CAST(ISNULL( SUM(BudgetTotal - RealTotal) , 0) AS NUMERIC(18,4)) AS RemainingBudget FROM activitybudget_view where CoId = ':1' AND BplId = ':2' AND Fiscal = :3 AND Activity = ':4' AND Project = ':6' AND AcctCode = ':7' :5

Trim({0,8}) & ' - Total Account per OCR: ' & Str({0,9}, VarPic({0,9}, 0))

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT CAST(ISNULL( SUM(BudgetTotal - RealTotal) , 0) AS NUMERIC(18,4)) AS RemainingBudget FROM activitybudget_view where CoId = ':1' AND BplId = ':2' AND Fiscal = :3 AND AcctCode = ':4' AND Project = ':6' :5

ExpSyntax.val: IF({32768,120}, ' AND OcrCode = ' & ASCIIChr(39) & Trim(IF(ISNULL({0,6}), '', {0,6})) & ASCIIChr(39), '')

SQL_STMT_U.val: select b.ItemCode, isnull(b.iscommited,0) as iscommited, isnull(x.available,0) available, isnull(b.MinStock,0) MinStock from oita b (nolock) join oitm m (nolock) on b.ItemCode = m.ItemCode left join ( select s.BPLid, ItemCode, sum((iif(OnHand<0,0,OnHand)+iif(OnOrder<0,0,OnOrder))) as available from oitw b (nolock) left join owhs s (nolock) on s.WhsCode=b.WhsCode where s.BPLid=:1 and s.Grp_Code='Yes' group by ItemCode,s.BPLid ) x on b.ItemCode=x.ItemCode and b.BPLid=x.BPLid where m.InvntItem = 'Y' and b.BplId=:1 and (isnull(available,0)<isnull(b.iscommited,0) or isnull(available,0)<isnull(MinStock,0))

select x.ItemCode, iscommited,available,MinStock from ( select s.BPLid,ItemCode,sum((iif(OnHand<0,0,OnHand)+iif(OnOrder<0,0,OnOrder))) as available from oitw b (nolock) left join owhs s (nolock) on s.WhsCode=b.WhsCode where s.BPLid=:1 and s.Grp_Code='Yes' group by ItemCode,s.BPLid )x left join oita b (nolock) on b.ItemCode=x.ItemCode and b.BPLid=x.BPLid where available<isnull(iscommited,0) and available<isnull(MinStock,999999999)

select x.ItemCode, iscommited,available,MinStock from ( select s.BPLid,ItemCode,sum((iif(OnHand<0,0,OnHand)+iif(OnOrder<0,0,OnOrder))) as available from oitw b (nolock) left join owhs s (nolock) on s.WhsCode=b.WhsCode where s.BPLid=:1 and s.Grp_Code='Yes' group by ItemCode,s.BPLid )x left join oita b (nolock) on b.ItemCode=x.ItemCode and b.BPLid=x.BPLid where available<isnull(iscommited,0) and available<isnull(MinStock,999999999)
